setup_script_description: sets focus on and expands the Combobox
task: navigate to specific option in listbox popup
specific_user_instruction: With focus on the listbox popup, type a printable character to set focus on a specific option.
output_assertions: Text of the focused option in the popup ('Apple') is conveyed
State of the focused option in the popup (not selected) is conveyed
Position of the focused option in the popup (2) is conveyed
Number of options in the popup (13) is conveyed
